sentences.en: Concrete cofferdams are mostly used for longitudinal cofferdams, high transversal coffer - dams and overflow cofferdams.
sentences.cn: 混凝土围堰较多用于纵向围堰 、 横向高围堰及过水围堰.

sentences.en: For container securing most important is the transversal acceleration. For example deck accelerations.
sentences.cn: 对集装箱包扎来说,最主要的是横向加速率, 例如甲板上的横向加速率.

sentences.en: Machining performance is also compared between longitudinaland transversal steamways.
sentences.cn: 比较了两种不同钻孔方向的汽孔机械加工工艺性能.

sentences.en: Melt chamber designed movable in vertical and transversal directions.
sentences.cn: 热炉垂直、前后、横向可移动设计.

sentences.en: Objective To study the advantage and indication of transversal approach in the treatment of cardiac cancer.
sentences.cn: 目的研究经腹入路治疗胃底贲门癌的获益和指征.

sentences.en: Some special subsemigroups of regular semigroups with an inverse transversal was discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了具有逆断面的正则半群的一些特殊子半群.

sentences.en: The causes of inner transversal crack of cold - draw heavy wall pipe of 45 steel were analyzed.
sentences.cn: 通过提高管坯质量和改进拉拔、中间退火工艺,使厚壁管内横裂缺陷基本消除.

sentences.en: The composite bar, transversal longitudinal section and interface of copper cladding aluminum are analyzed.
sentences.cn: 试验研究了铜包铝双金属棒制备的工艺,分析了铜包铝双金属棒的外观、断面和界面.

sentences.en: The practice shows that the model can remarkably reduce transversal and corner cracks on slab surface.
sentences.cn: 生产实际应用表明,该模型对减少板坯表面横裂纹和角部裂纹有显著效果.

sentences.en: These subsemigroups play a decisive role in constructing regular semigroups with an inverse transversal.
sentences.cn: 这些子半群在构造具有逆断面的正则半群中起决定性作用.

sentences.en: This transversal event will involve the areas of fashion, photography, and contemporary art.
sentences.cn: 展览涵盖了时尚, 摄影以及当代艺术.

words.tran_cn: 横向的；横断的；横断线的（等于transverse）

trans.tran_en: a line intersecting two or more other lines
